website_summaries.verdict: If you already have Hive products in your home, this camera is the one to buy. If you don't, consider your home's ecosystem before making a purchase.
pros: The Hive View indoor camera has a stylish design and good specs, including 1080p HD and live streaming
cons: While Hive does have third-party integration skills for some products, there aren't any third-party integrations for the Hive View camera

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great high quality camera to start or add to your HIVE HOME system. I am very satisfied with all my HIVE HOME Products. Using the HIVE app you can get notifications if someone enters your home or to live view at any time. The app makes scheduling easy too. Easy set up, took maybe 2 min.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Star

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for a few weeks then it started freezing up made over 10 calls to there tech line and they never figured out the problem went ahead and replaced the unit and again worked good for about a week and it started acting up again they told me that one of there main tech was going to contact me to figure out the problem and that was 2 weeks ago!!! Returned it back and bought a Canary so far so good!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton C.

customer_reviews.title: Sound like a good idea but terrible hardware and software. Stay away!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Camera works okay for 30 days and then stopped working on day 33, which is right outside the return window. I never got the two way communication to work. You get some small crackling noise but no sound out of the camera. The app sometime have camera stuck on "recording in progress". Camera now blink red and no matter how long i press the reset button it won't reset. I now have a nice blinking paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Thach

customer_reviews.title: Great cameras
customer_reviews.text: Great cameras for security in the house or office. Connects easily to the hub.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: Have not been able to get this to work yet. Money wasted. Light continues to flick back and forth and then it goes offline after being on for a couple minutes. Will not purchase any more Hive.
customer_reviews.author: The Cool kids

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and good clarity
customer_reviews.text: Camera works great and the app is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: The appearance is nice and the picture is crystal clear. Very easy to use. It fits our home so well.
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Great product. It would be nice to have two way communication and facial recognition.
customer_reviews.author: James Andersen

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it ... i couldnt set up an account the website and app was always down
customer_reviews.author: victoria jimenez

customer_reviews.title: This camera works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and easy to use. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: kristie

customer_reviews.title: Would not update, microphone feature not working!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 other HIVE cameras, decided to get another since the price has dropped. The picture quality is great! Nice looking camera but the microphone would not work. Spent 3 hours trying update the software. My other cameras work great and I have never had a problem. I guess this one is defective, will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: nassa kachema

customer_reviews.title: Great for watching pets!
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this to watch two big dogs during the day. They are terrors when left alone so this helps keep an eye on them and if needed, come home to keep them from getting in too much trouble. Setup was a breeze (even if you aren't too tech savvy). We love the app and alerts and so far all is going well with it. Makes us happy to have a little peace of mind when they aren't around. Also has very good picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Amicucci

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and set up
customer_reviews.text: This camera was easy to install and set up. The instructions are good. The picture quality is excellent. The 2 way sound is a great feature. It starts recording when it detects motion or sound. It looks really cool, too. The night vision works to around 30 feet or so. You can subscribe to a service that will keep 30 days of recordings available. Otherwise, you can pull up the past 24 hours whenever you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Tell It Like It Is

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking camera set up. The camera and stand are sleek and modern looking. The App downloaded and installed from iTunes quickly with no problems. I was pleased to see that it was so easy to get set up. What I'm most pleased about is the quality of the recordings. The resolution is nice and crisp. My only complaint is I would like to see better instructions. Maybe a page that points out the parts of the camera, and what's included in the box. Basically, this is a very nice camera set up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: It works, really well.
customer_reviews.text: What I like is that I received this from my electric provider for free. I didn't open it for a while, just put it on a shelf. I bought something else and that stopped working about three weeks later. I was thinking of buying something else when I remembered the Hive sitting on my shelf. I opened this product and read the directions and set it up looking at my back door and it's been sitting there for the past month, no problems. The picture quality is perfect. I will be ordering another one for my front door.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent...
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent camera with many features, however the live feature isn’t the best. In the app, live is not keeping up as well and takes a long time to load and color mode is very hard to run into if there’s shadows or the lamp isn’t on. The microphone feature is very good though, night vision is spactacular, backup battery is convenient, it looks sexy with a nice base, and when the footage is delayed, it catches up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Mike N Elmo

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I quit using indoor cameras as I think they are creepy for guests and also for me. I tolerate this one, it's nice looking for one, I have it on my desk, it doesn't really look like a camera so much. Simple to use, just add to your WIFI.
customer_reviews.author: PasoCreek

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, but short battery life means you need to keep it plugged in
customer_reviews.text: This was a very easy camera to setup, both the unit itself and registering on Hive. The camera battery only lasts for an hour, so I needed to put it somewhere near an outlet. I don't have the Hive hub, so can't comment yet on how it integrates with the rest of their line of products.
customer_reviews.author: Bukkene Bruse

product_meta.title: Hive View Security Camera, Wireless Indoor Smart Home Security Camera, Wifi Enabled, White/Champagne Gold
product_meta.description: Style:Camera - WhiteHive Smart Home devices enable worry-free home automation to fit all your household needs. Heat and cool your home with the Smart Thermostat or the Heating & Cooling Pack. Perfectly fit the mood with a variety of smart bulbs, ranging from any color imaginable to dimmable white. Never worry about your home while away with a Wi-Fi Home Security Camera to watch your pet or a Smart Home Plug to remotely control your appliances. The Hive eco-system only grows stronger the more digital devices you have, as hub-enabled devices act as signal repeaters to form a mesh network to enable a single hub to support an even larger area.
feature_bullets: You will receive (1) Wi-Fi Home Security Camera, Indoor, White/Champagne Gold
Peace of mind while you're away: Starts recording in 1080p when it detects motion or sound
Two-way audio great for telling a pet to behave or to say hello to the kids
Easy to move: Wireless, light and portable, with 1 hour built-in battery life
Works with Alexa, Google Home and IFTTT

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars79 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
